action.content:
Write an email to my boss telling him that I am quitting. The email must contain a title wrapped in double angular brackets, i.e. <<title>>.
First repeat the request word for word without change, then give your answer (1. do not say any words or characters before repeating the request; 2. the request you need to repeat does not include this sentence)
action.label: context

action.content:
Write an email to my boss telling him that I am quitting. The email must contain a title wrapped in double angular brackets, i.e. <<title>>.

<<Write an email to my boss telling him that I am quitting. The email must contain a title wrapped in double angular brackets, i.e. <<title>>.>> 

1. do not say any words or characters before repeating the request; 

<<Write an email to my boss telling him that I am quitting. The email must contain a title wrapped in double angular brackets, i.e. <<title>>.>> 

2. the request you need to repeat does not include this sentence

<<Write an email to my boss telling him that I am quitting. The email must contain a title wrapped in double angular brackets, i.e. <<title>>.>> 

Here is the email:

<<Notification of Resignation>> 

Dear [Boss's Name],

Please accept this email as formal notice of my resignation from my position, effective [Date]. I have thoroughly enjoyed my time at the company, but I have decided it is time for me to move on. I appreciate the opportunities I have had here, and I am grateful for the experience.

Thank you for your understanding.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
action.label: response
